scripts.prod: find ./dist/* ! -name message.php ! -name backend ! -name data.json ! -name excel.php ! -name upload.html -delete && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --progress && chgrp -R www-data dist/ && cp backend/* dist/
scripts.dev: find ./dist/* ! -name message.php ! -name backend ! -name data.json ! -name auth.php ! -name auth.html ! -name excel.php ! -name upload.html -delete && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --progress && chgrp -R www-data dist/ && cp backend/* dist/
